thread.section_title: Host Havoc Ltd. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Host Havoc Ltd. | hosthavoc.com
thread.title: Asgeir Pyrazire
thread.title_full: Host Havoc Ltd. reviewed by Asgeir Pyrazire

author: Asgeir Pyrazire
title: Asgeir Pyrazire
text:
you have an issue they have a response within the day. The server itself is highly reliable and their techs are always ready with advice.
My one and only frustration is that while the email says auto payment will occur if u don't pay your invoice, if u are using PayPal it will not.
That said having to pay manually is a very small price to pay for costumer service of this level
